content.rendered:
Maple Ave Morning Announcements 

September 16th, 2025 

Today is a “C” Day    

 

  • Wellness Wednesday is back! On Wednesday wear your comfiest and coziest outfit. 

 

  • The Parent Network’s biggest fundraiser of the year starts today—and YOU get to be part of the excitement! 

During Flex, you’ll watch a quick video that explains how the Walkathon works, how to collect donations, and how to earn some seriously cool prizes. 

We’ve a fun few weeks ahead—and the best part is every dollar raised goes right back to supporting our amazing students and school community. 

 

  • Ski club packets with mandatory paperwork are now available in each hall office. If you want to join the club, these packets must be thoroughly completed. 7th and 8th graders will turn in their completed forms in front of student services on 9/24 and 9/25. 6th graders will turn in their forms on 9/26. Forms must be turned in on these dates ONLY. You cannot turn in forms early. See Mrs. Deutsch or Mr. Scrivo with any questions. 

 iReady 9/17-9/19 Charge device, get a good night sleep and have a well-balanced breakfast. Breakfast at school is an option! 

     

    Today’s Lunch is French toast sticks, turkey sausage links or cheese omelet, sweet potato tots and orange juice 

     

    Be Respectful   Be Responsible   Be Safe   Be Kind   Be Here 

    Make it a great day or not. The choice is yours!
